mainBoard.name: Rigging Runner
mainBoard.originalText:
First strike
Raid — Rigging Runner enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked this turn.

rulings.text: Raid abilities care only that you attacked with a creature. It doesn’t matter how many creatures you attacked with, or which opponent or planeswalker controlled by an opponent those creatures attacked.

Raid abilities evaluate the entire turn to see if you attacked with a creature. That creature doesn’t have to still be on the battlefield. Similarly, the player or planeswalker it attacked doesn’t have to still be in the game or on the battlefield, respectively.

Incursione — La Salva delle Bocche di Fuoco infligge invece 6 danni se hai attaccato in questo turno.

foreignData.flavorText: ゴブリンは恐れを知らず小柄である。砲手には最適だ。
foreignData.name: 火炎砲発射
foreignData.text:
クリーチャー１体を対象とする。火炎砲発射はそれに３点のダメージを与える。
強襲 ― このターンにあなたが攻撃していたなら、代わりに、火炎砲発射は６点のダメージを与える。

foreignData.flavorText: 鬼怪无所畏惧、身材矮小，是炮手的最佳人选。
foreignData.name: 火炎炮轰击
foreignData.text:
火炎炮轰击对目标生物造成3点伤害。
突击～如果你本回合中攻击过，则改为火炎炮轰击造成6点伤害。

mainBoard.name: Firecannon Blast
mainBoard.originalText:
Firecannon Blast deals 3 damage to target creature.
Raid — Firecannon Blast deals 6 damage instead if you attacked this turn.

rulings.text: Raid abilities care only that you attacked with a creature. It doesn’t matter how many creatures you attacked with, or which opponent or planeswalker controlled by an opponent those creatures attacked.

Raid abilities evaluate the entire turn to see if you attacked with a creature. That creature doesn’t have to still be on the battlefield. Similarly, the player or planeswalker it attacked doesn’t have to still be in the game or on the battlefield, respectively.

mainBoard.text:
Firecannon Blast deals 3 damage to target creature.
Raid — Firecannon Blast deals 6 damage instead if you attacked this turn.

foreignData.name: Tollkühne Kanonade
foreignData.text:
Immer wenn eine angreifende Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, stirbt, fügt die Tollkühne Kanonade jedem Gegner 2 Schadenspunkte zu.
Überfall — Zu Beginn deiner Hauptphase nach dem Kampf und falls du in diesem Zug angegriffen hast, schicke die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek ins Exil. Du kannst die Karte bis zum Ende des Kampfes in deinem nächsten Zug spielen.

foreignData.name: Cañonazos de Azófar
foreignData.text:
Siempre que una criatura atacante que controlas muera, los Cañonazos de Azófar hacen 2 puntos de daño a cada oponente.
Incursión — Al comienzo de tu fase principal poscombate, si atacaste con una criatura este turno, exilia la primera carta de tu biblioteca. Hasta el final del combate en tu próximo turno, puedes jugar esa carta.

foreignData.name: Canonnade intrépide
foreignData.text:
À chaque fois qu'une créature attaquante que vous contrôlez meurt, la Canonnade intrépide inflige 2 blessures à chaque adversaire.
Saccage — Au début de votre deuxième phase principale, si vous avez attaqué avec une créature ce tour-ci, exilez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Jusqu'à la fin du combat de votre prochain tour, vous pouvez jouer cette carte.

foreignData.name: Cannonata di Bronzo
foreignData.text:
Ogniqualvolta una creatura attaccante che controlli muore, la Cannonata di Bronzo infligge 2 danni a ogni avversario.
Incursione — All'inizio della tua fase principale post-combattimento, se hai attaccato con una creatura in questo turno, esilia la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Fino alla fine del combattimento nel tuo prossimo turno, puoi giocare quella carta.

foreignData.name: 鉄面連合の連続砲撃
foreignData.text:
あなたがコントロールしている攻撃クリーチャー１体が死亡するたび、鉄面連合の連続砲撃は各対戦相手にそれぞれ２点のダメージを与える。
強襲 — あなたの戦闘後メイン・フェイズの開始時に、このターンにあなたがクリーチャーで攻撃していた場合、あなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカード１枚を追放する。次のあなたのターンの戦闘終了時まで、あなたはそのカードをプレイしてもよい。

foreignData.name: 莽霸联盟炮击
foreignData.text:
每当一个由你操控且进行攻击的生物死去时，莽霸联盟炮击向每位对手各造成2点伤害。
突击～在你战斗后的行动阶段开始时，若你本回合中曾以生物攻击，则放逐你的牌库顶牌。直到你下一个回合的战斗结束，你可以使用该牌。

mainBoard.name: Brazen Cannonade
mainBoard.originalText:
Whenever an attacking creature you control dies, Brazen Cannonade deals 2 damage to each opponent.
Raid — At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, if you attacked with a creature this turn, exile the top card of your library. Until end of combat on your next turn, you may play that card.

rulings.text: If you don't play the exiled card, it remains in exile.

If you exile a land card with the raid ability, you may play that land only if you have any available land plays. Normally, this means you can play the land only if you haven't played a land yet that turn.
Playing an exiled card causes it to leave exile. You can't play it multiple times.

The card exiled by the raid ability is exiled face up. Playing a card exiled with this ability follows the normal rules for playing the card. You must pay its costs, and you must follow all applicable timing rules. For example, if it's a creature card, you can cast it only during your main phase while the stack is empty.

mainBoard.text:
Whenever an attacking creature you control dies, Brazen Cannonade deals 2 damage to each opponent.
Raid — At the beginning of your second main phase, if you attacked this turn, exile the top card of your library. Until end of combat on your next turn, you may play that card.

mainBoard.flavorText: Sky pirates often leap randomly into the fray and assume there will be something to land on.

foreignData.text: All'inizio del combattimento nel tuo turno, crea una pedina creatura Pirata 1/1 rossa con minacciare e rapidità. Esiliala all'inizio della prossima sottofase finale.

foreignData.flavorText: 空の海賊はしばしば、きっと着地先があるだろうとの仮定のもと、場当たり的に戦いに飛び込む。

foreignData.text: あなたのターンの戦闘の開始時に、威迫と速攻を持つ赤の１/１の海賊・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。次の終了ステップの開始時に、それを追放する。

mainBoard.name: Daring Piracy
mainBoard.originalText: At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 red Pirate creature token with menace and haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
mainBoard.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 red Pirate creature token with menace and haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

foreignData.name: Prüfung des Purphoros
foreignData.text:
Verzaubert eine Kreatur
Immer wenn die verzauberte Kreatur angreift, lege eine +1/+1-Marke auf sie. Falls dann drei oder mehr +1/+1-Marken auf ihr liegen, opfere die Prüfung des Purphoros.
Wenn du die Prüfung des Purphoros opferst, fügt sie einem Ziel deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreignData.name: Ordalía de Purforos
foreignData.text:
Encantar criatura.
Siempre que la criatura encantada ataque, pon un contador +1/+1 sobre ella. Luego, si tiene tres o más contadores +1/+1 sobre ella, sacrifica la Ordalía de Purforos.
Cuando sacrifiques la Ordalía de Purforos, hace 3 puntos de daño a cualquier objetivo.

foreignData.name: Épreuve de Purphoros
foreignData.text:
Enchanter : créature
À chaque fois que la créature enchantée attaque, mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur elle. Ensuite, si elle a au moins trois marqueurs +1/+1 sur elle, sacrifiez l'Épreuve de Purphoros.
Quand vous sacrifiez l'Épreuve de Purphoros, elle inflige 3 blessures à n'importe quelle cible.

foreignData.name: Ordalia di Purforos
foreignData.text:
Incanta creatura
Ogniqualvolta la creatura incantata attacca, metti un segnalino +1/+1 su di essa. Poi, se ha tre o più segnalini +1/+1, sacrifica l'Ordalia di Purforos.
Quando sacrifichi l'Ordalia di Purforos, infligge 3 danni a un qualsiasi bersaglio.

foreignData.name: パーフォロスの試練
foreignData.text:
エンチャント（クリーチャー）
エンチャントしているクリーチャーが攻撃するたび、それの上に＋１/＋１カウンター１個を置く。その後、それの上に３個以上の＋１/＋１カウンターがあるなら、パーフォロスの試練を生け贄に捧げる。
あなたがパーフォロスの試練を生け贄に捧げたとき、クリーチャーやプレインズウォーカーやプレイヤーのうち１つを対象とする。これはそれに３点のダメージを与える。
foreignData.type: エンチャント — オーラ

foreignData.name: 普罗烽斯的试炼
foreignData.text:
结附于生物
每当所结附的生物攻击时，在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。然后如果该生物上有三个或更多+1/+1指示物，则牺牲普罗烽斯的试炼。
当你牺牲普罗烽斯的试炼时，它对任意一个目标造成3点伤害。

mainBoard.name: Ordeal of Purphoros
mainBoard.originalText:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Purphoros.
When you sacrifice Ordeal of Purphoros, it deals 3 damage to any target.

rulings.text: If you sacrifice the Ordeal in some other way, its last ability will trigger.
The +1/+1 counter is put on the creature before blockers are declared and before combat damage is dealt.

The check of whether the enchanted creature has three or more +1/+1 counters on it happens as part of the resolution of the attack triggered ability. If the third +1/+1 counter is put on the enchanted creature any other way, you won't sacrifice the Ordeal until the next time the creature attacks.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Purphoros.
When you sacrifice Ordeal of Purphoros, it deals 3 damage to any target.
